lender.name: patti

lender.occupational_info: What I do can be summed up a quote written by Phillips Brooks, "The truest help we can render an afflicted man is not to take his burden from him, but to call out his best energy, that he may be able to bear the burden."

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I believe a big believer in living the change you want to see in the world
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently transitioning to a new field.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: All that I've read on micro-loans has been positive. I feel that I can leverage my donation dollars by giving in this fashion.

lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help people who want to work. may their Business florish more than ever.

lender.name: Dee

lender.name: Dusty
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an easy way to help create sustainable employment for people just like me.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus and I believe in the transformative power that microfinance can have on individuals, their families and their communities!
lender.occupational_info: For 5 months over the past year I traveled the US with an exhibit called the World Vision Experience: AIDS. Now I'm back in the office supporting the tour and working on new product development.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: Great way to help others...makes me feel great,.and has a way of empowering others.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies better understand and speak to their customers.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: Helping others changes the world

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I understand the difference many small contributions can make when used to support good works.
lender.occupational_info: I work to support non-profit organizations by helping them market and promote their services.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: we all need assistance

lender.name: Kimberle E.
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have in my life and wish to help others to realize their dreams.

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: Not the sun or the summer alone, but every hour and season yields its tribute of delight; for every hour and change corresponds to a different state of the mind, from breathless noon to grimmest midnightCrossing a bare common, in snow puddles, at twilight, under a clouded sky, without having in my thoughts any occurrence of special good fortune, I have enjoyed perfect exhilaration. I am glad to the brink of fear. Ralph Waldo Emerson

lender.name: Jacquelyn
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderful organization.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy building things. I get great from fulfillment by seeing things being bulit from start to finish.

lender.name: Jennifer

lender.name: Haroun

lender.occupational_info: I'm a University student

lender.occupational_info: I am a master of mitosis!

lender.name: Ville
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: This is the best idea Ive heard in ages
lender.occupational_info: Performer of miracles (on a tight budget).

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference. I needed help when I was a young single parent and had to care for two small babies on my own. I was aided years ago with an electric bill, and now I give back tenfold because I can. I remember what it felt like without power - literally and figuratively. With no lights I made it fun for my little ones and we shadow danced by candlelight and cuddled up in the cold in our tiny apartment till the power went back on. My children only remember the shadow dancing and the giggles. I kept them warm and safe. It's because of my children that I will continue to give to others for the rest of my life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and poet. I paint, sculpt, draw, and write poetry books with pictures of my art in the book. I treasure my work, and I can share it with the world, and it makes me happy. I have worked various jobs in my life: House cleaner, hotel industry, mother of five children, tech industry, director of sales and marketing, health club, restaurants, movie production office assistant, dental assistant......I have never loved anything more than creating my own work and selling it. You can do anything you set your mind to......take help now, then pay it forward and help someone else when you can.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I like to help people. That is why I am a nurse. I especially like to help people who are working to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse currently working in the Internal Medicine Clinic of a U.S. Air Force Hospital. My work can be summed up as assisting in the continuity of care for our patients including renewals of regular medications, administration of one time or periodic medications, and educating our patients about their medical treatments and conditions.

lender.name: Konan Philippe
lender.loan_because: I intend to open a factory of manufacturing of pavements.
lender.occupational_info: Acquisition of a ground and machines for the implementation of the factory. As well as the workforce and all the necessities for the production of pavements.

lender.name: Terrence
lender.loan_because:
I started several businesses in my life and they are very tough without borrowing money. It is very satisfying to be able to help someone else get a business started.
I've spent my entire career in finance and this area of finance is very interesting. The notion that individuals can function as lenders to other individuals is exciting to me.
lender.occupational_info: Help insurance companies better understand risk using mathematics and software.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: It feels good
lender.occupational_info: Purchase goods for generator production line

lender.loan_because: Youth is the period between childhood and adulthood, generally from ages 13-21. An individual's actual maturity may not correspond to their chronological age, as immature individuals exist at all ages. When we supporting the youth it will cause an upward trend in every aspect of their lives and will create more opportunities for their own children by giving them a jumpstart and firm foundation to build on for future generations.
lender.occupational_info: Youth is the period between childhood and adulthood, generally from ages 13-21. lender.name: Leslie

lender.occupational_info: Manages the Health Information Management department which is responsible for analyzing, compiling, and coding. Reviews medical records for completeness and accuracy, and assigns diagnostic and procedure codes. Prepares monthly, quarterly and annual statistical reports. Reviews department performance relative to established goals. Implements changes to effect continual improvement in services provided and assures compliance with regulatory and legal requirements.

lender.name: Lesley

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: God has always provided for my family. Because God loved me enough to send Jesus to die for my sins and pay my debt, it is my joy to give to others. For those to whom we give, we are praying that God will show Himself to you and that you will come to know the sweet love of Jesus when you give your life to Him.
lender.occupational_info: My greatest work is teaching my children to love God and to love others. I also translate documents into French for American families wishing to adopt a child from Haiti.

lender.name: Louie
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to deal with their emotional problems.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I forecast the weather

lender.name: Lourdes
lender.loan_because:
I believe in microfinance as a tool to alleviate poverty
twitter @lulatoussaint

lender.name: Ahmed
lender.loan_because: I realize that a small amount of my money can make a huge difference in someone's life half the world away.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would like to be able to give the loan money to kiva, when paid back. Please do it for me, as I am not PC savy. Jim Gerke

lender.name: John Snyder
lender.loan_because: It makes me very happy.

lender.name: Miron & Carrie
lender.loan_because: hopefully it will make a positive difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help others.

lender.name: The Blaser Family
lender.loan_because: We enrolled in Kiva to find ways to help others around the world. The kids help select the loans and really like helping other children.
lender.occupational_info: We move around the world a lot as diplomats.

lender.name: Louisa
lender.loan_because: It is amazing how much a small sum can make a difference.

lender.name: Clint
lender.occupational_info: I drive around and deliver packages to people.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I am interested in sharing the little I have with others who need resources that I am able to provide. There is little risk to me, and whatever risk there is, I feel, is beyond the control of the borrower. Let me try, for a little while, to share the pain of another person who's not as fortunate as me. I am happy to do this little thing.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English as a Second Language to adults attending college and university in Canadas, trying to rebuild their lives. However, I became ill and was forced to take a long term disability leave of absence. Through this, I understand a little of what my students endured as they are attempting to restart their lives.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I study mechanical engineering

lender.name: Beverly
lender.occupational_info: I help people find employment and with planning new or changing careers.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs and dreamers.

lender.name: Renae
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with plenty which allows me to share with others. I love to love other people by helping them help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I have 3 children that I stay home with. I take care of the children and our home, my husband works and earns the money to support the whole family. I also do volunteer work with young moms. In my country girls who have children in thier teenage years and early 20's are not common and they need extra support and encouragement, I run a support and social group for those girls in my town.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: I believe that there are many good, hardworking people on our planet, who with a little help, can be successful inside their family units and communities. We all need a little help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I teach university English in South Korea

lender.name: Tri
lender.loan_because: international business, one tiny bit at a time :). Besides, I used to be poor :)
lender.occupational_info: engineer

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I help people write better and communicate effectively with the people they are trying to reach.

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Catholic moral thought.

lender.name: 13th KIP
lender.loan_because: we are inspired! Having returned from a life-changing trip through India, we saw first hand the positive impact you can have on those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: 40 youth . 16 countries. A common belief that we can make a difference in the fight against poverty.

lender.name: M.D
lender.loan_because: So many people elsewhere need a hand, and so many people in Norway are greedy...
lender.occupational_info: I sweep, I fix, I carry, I clean, I help.

lender.name: Ino
lender.loan_because: Help people to master her live.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software-architect. I work in the automotive Industry to verify Soft- and Hardware-Architecture. Anke, my wife works in a apothecary . My son Karl goes to high-school.

lender.name: Kemi
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that a little money can go such a long way!

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: People know best what they need, and they invest the money in projects that will give them both a better life and a future return on the investment. Not give a friend fish, teach your friend how to fish!

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to make myself useful to other persons who need help.

lender.name: lea
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that one of the elements to end poverty and improve human rights is to give people the opportunity to be economically independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a defence lawyer (legal assistant) in international criminal trials.

lender.name: Kate and Nancy
lender.loan_because: we want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Nancy is in public relations and Kate is a student.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I love to learn more about the projects my money is used for. Kiva offers a good way to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Distributing Information via Internet

lender.name: rickey
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I would like to support people who are building the future for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Developing new and better vaccines against infectious diseases.

lender.name: Kla
lender.loan_because: What's that saying? Give a man a fish and he eats for a day; teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime. Something like that.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on self-rated health and cultural conceptions of disease and medicine.

lender.name: Sigrid
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the concept.
lender.occupational_info: International Relations

lender.name: Jackson
lender.loan_because: I can and should.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies and not-for-profit organizations improve their internal and external communications.

lender.name: Margie
lender.loan_because: It helps me feel connected directly and personally to where my financial help goes
lender.occupational_info: Currently working with military and their families coping with the military life and deployment issues.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to connect with people throughout the world

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems between businesses when they do not get what they expect from an agreement. I also lead the largest funding source for legal aid in my state, and teach at a local law school.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying to help themselves. I've donated in the past to similar causes but I like the repayment idea because it shows commitment and responsibility by the entrepreneurs and it allows me to spread the money to more people.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It is the obvious thing to do

lender.name: Sanghee
lender.loan_because: I know how it is to start with almost nothing. My story is a very typical one for an immigrant. When I arrived at the Honolulu, Hawaii international airport about 20 some years ago, I had only $400.00 U.S money in my pocket.
lender.occupational_info:
My work is to help everyday people like me to be able to create, promote, and sustain better environment for themselves and others to come after.
Check out our business mission statement. http://www.myjigoo.com/en/about-myjigoo

lender.name: Denis and Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to be connected to my fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I review and approve building plans for a municipality

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I was blessed by other people giving me a helping hand, and our world can be made a much better place by individuals reaching out to others in need. This one-to-one interaction is our best hope of destroying the cycle of hate that seems so prevalent today.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a civil rights lawyer who helps those abused by misuse of government power.

lender.name: Josseline
lender.loan_because: Because I would like to give some one an opportunity to feel the way I feel everyday I go to work...happy to be able to provide for my family.
lender.occupational_info: I make it possible for people to communicate across many miles.

lender.name: Zarai
lender.loan_because: Good idea! let's see if it works!
